slider.gamedes: Moto X3M brings awesome bike racing. So grab your motorbike strap on your helmet and grab some airtime over obstacles to beat the clock on amazing off road circuits.

Venge.io is an online multiplayer First-Person Shooter game. It is a fast-paced shooter with an engaged and competitive community. There are four standard game modes and maps and countless custom maps/game modes.
Monkey Mart is an idle/management game made by TinyDobbins. You control a cute monkey character that just created their supermarket.
Rally Champion is a realistic car racing game where you must race to finish in first place in various racing tracks across the globe.
Temple Run 2: Holi Festival is an endless runner game developed by Imangi. Celebrate the Holi Festival in the reimagined colorful temples in Temple Run 2

quiz_games.gamedes: Brain Test is an addictive free tricky puzzle game with a series of tricky brain teasers. Different riddles and tricky tests will challenge your mind. This new puzzle game may break common sense and bring your new brain-pushing experience!
Once started it will be impossible to stop playing until you finish the quiz or turned mad!The Impossible Quiz is a free, fun and challenging brain-teaser loaded with questions, puzzles and more.

With over a zillion downloads, Brain Test: Tricky Puzzles redefined brain games. Now get more of the same exciting riddles and funny tests with Brain Test 2! If you like tricky games, riddles or brain games then Brain Test 2 with tricky tests is a great exercise for your brain.

Join Alyx on her quest to find the six power gems in order to save her dying father. While helping Alyx to overcome tricky and brain teasing puzzles, meet with Brain Test franchise characters along the way.
Quiz Planet is a fast-paced quiz game of intergalactic proportions where you can compete against your friends and other players.
TIME TO QUIZ! It's the perfect game for hours of fun! Answer hundreds of quizzes created by other users and create your own quizzes so everyone can answer and rate it!

The “Little Stories” series present bedtime fairy tales for children, in which kid plays the main part. It’s quite simple – just enter kid’s name and gender in the settings window and enjoy reading personalised books. This is free short story books for children and toddlers with audio.

A perfect combination of tricky riddles, draw lines to save them all, and delete one part. All have created Brain Test - Thinking Game one of today’s top super intellectual brain games. Brain Test - Thinking Game will increase your thinking ability and make your mind quick to solve all complex quizzes.
